entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:31 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -32.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whale Cove Airport 12:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -32.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -36.3°C
Wind: NNW 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blowing snow. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 36 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
